alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 2:25PM MDT until September 04 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN LAWRENCE AND WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 225 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Black Fox Campground to near Keystone Wye, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Silver City, Rochford, Mystic, Roubaix Lake, and Pactola Reservoir around 230 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Johnson Siding and Nemo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
